articles.description: Six people are in custody at a London police station over suspected activity linked to the PKK.

articles.description: The storm is forecast to track east during Tuesday night and into Wednesday, but will not be at its worst until it has passed through the UK.
articles.title: Storm Conall to bring more rain to parts of England and Wales

articles.description: Supermarket customers can save money with loyalty cards but should still shop around.
articles.title: Loyalty cards offer genuine savings, says watchdog

articles.title: Gambling: Addict spent wedding night betting couple's money
